Adventures in Text is a Choose-your-own style text-based game engine.

This constructor is Private so there can not be an instance of the Adventure class.

This method will cause the game to end, outputting whatever text is passed in to it before ending in an infinite loop, which forces the user to close the console window.

G

GameActor - Interface in Adventure.API
This interface is used to represent any non-player characters within the game that can have conversations and inventories of their own.
GameDialog - Interface in Adventure.API
This interface is used to represent a single spoken dialog between a GameActor and the Player.
GameItem - Interface in Adventure.API
This interface is used to represent any item within the game world that the Player or a GameActor can interact with.
GameLevelMap - Interface in Adventure.API
This interface is used to define the overall game map in which all GameObjects exist.
GameLocation - Interface in Adventure.API
This interface is used to represent any location within the game world that the Player can explore.
GameObject - Interface in Adventure.API
This interface represents any entity that can be manipulated by this game engine.
gameObjects - Static variable in class Adventure.Core.Level
This ArrayList holds all of the GameActor, GameItem, and GameLocation objects that were created by the current GameLevelMap.
gameObjects() - Static method in class Adventure.Core.Level
This getter method is used to retrieve the list of GameObjects for the level.
GameRuleSet - Interface in Adventure.API
This interface represents a set of game rules that need to be applied each turn.
getInput() - Static method in class Adventure.Core.Engine
This method is used to get user input from the keyboard and to send it to the Processor to be processed.
getUnprocessedInput() - Static method in class Adventure.Core.Engine
This method is used to get user input, but instead of sending it to the Processor, the input is returned to the caller.

This overload of the giveItem() method is used to give a GameItem in this GameActor's inventory to the Player.

This overload of the giveItem() method is used to give a GameItem in this GameActor's inventory to another Actor.
giveItem(String, GameActor) - Static method in class Adventure.Core.Player
This method will remove a specified item from the Player's inventory and give it to the specified actor.
